charges.charge_description: 18:2113A.F BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE-by intimidation did take from the person or present of another money, belonging to and in the possession of the Savings Bank of Manchester in Dayville, CT (1-2)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment for a term of 60 months on counts 1&;2 to be served concurrent to each other and to count 1 in related case (No. 2:98-cr-79-01) to be followed by 3 years S/R (also concurrent with related case) with conditions including: shall make restitution payments; at least 10% of his income should be credited to these payments; dft shall not incur new credit charges or open any add'l lines of credit w/o approval of USPO; dft shall permit USPO access to any requested financial info; dft shall participate in a program approved by USPO for substance abuse including testing, costs &; no alcohol; dft shall participate in a mental health program approved by USPO including costs. (1-2)
